headline: Bacon, Egg, and Cheese Sandwich
description: The breakfast of New Yorkers features crispy bacon, gooey cheese, and creamy eggs smushed between a kaiser roll.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 1
recipeInstructions.text: Tear or cut 2 bacon slices in half. Place in a single layer in a 10-inch nonstick frying pan. Cook over medium heat, flipping the bacon halfway through, until the bacon is cooked through and crisp, 5 to 7 minutes total. Meanwhile, split 1 kaiser roll in half horizontally with a serrated knife. Place 3 large eggs and 1/8 teaspoon kosher salt in a medium bowl and whisk with a fork until combined with no streaks of egg whites.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 2
recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the bacon to a paper-towel lined plate. Drain and discard the bacon fat in the skillet, then wipe the skillet clean with a paper towel.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 3
recipeInstructions.text: Return the skillet to medium heat. Add 1/2 tablespoon of the unsalted butter. When melted, swirl the pan to coat the bottom with butter. Add the kaiser roll halves cut-side down and gently slide along the bottom of the pan to evenly coat with the butter. Cook until the cut side is toasted and light golden, 2 to 3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the roll to a plate or place on top of a large sheet of parchment paper if youâ€™d like to wrap the sandwich up. Wipe any excess crumbs from the skillet.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
recipeInstructions.text: Reduce the heat to low (if your pan seems really hot, let it cool for a minute or two before placing back on the heat). Add the remaining 1/2 tablespoon unsalted butter. When melted, swirl again to coat the bottom of the pan. Add the eggs. Cover and cook undisturbed until the eggs are almost completely set but the top is still a little bit shiny, 3 to 4 minutes.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
recipeInstructions.text: Turn off the heat. Arrange 1 1/2 slices American cheese on one half of the eggs, then use a spatula to fold the other half over the cheese to make a half moon. Fold in half again to make a triangle. Slide the eggs and cheese onto the cut side of the bottom bun. Top with the bacon and close the sandwich with the top bun. Cut in half with a serrated knife, or wrap tightly in the parchment before slicing.

name: Bacon, Egg, and Cheese Sandwich

author.name: Laura Rege
author.description: Laura Rege is a recipe developer and food stylist living the mid-coastal lifestyle between Dallas and Brooklyn. Formerly a senior member of the editorial teams at Food & Wine and Martha Stewart Living, Laura now creates and styles recipes for websites like ours and cooking videos! When she's not in the kitchen for work, she is off traveling in the U.S. or abroad searching out the next delicious bite.
